skillTree.localised_description: All Dwarfs despise the Greenskins, for the urki and grobi are the prime agents in the Times of Woe.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Greenskins

skillTree.localised_description: Dwarfs are resolute - once they commit to charging the foe, they put all their strength behind that initial blow.
The endless courage of the Warrior God, directed to bolster this Dawi’s own reserves.

"We have taken the Slayer’s Oath and would pit our axes against those beasts. If we come back, have all your ale ready. If, instead, it is our time to take the Path of Grimnir, then may our doom be a mighty one. If we do not return, remember us to our clans and kings."
Slayers are constantly looking for the most glorious death in battle against the largest creatures, including dragons.
Daemon Slayer, a warrior who has managed to survive the encounter with one of the most ferocious creatures to ever live, slaying it and surviving to tell the tale.

effects.description: On the next turn start, this Dragon SlayerHero changes into a Daemon SlayerLord

skillTree.localised_description: Some Slayers, despite their best efforts to find and fight the most formidable of foes, still fail at their task of dying in battle. By dint of constant fighting, these rare Slayers become ever more scar-riddled and dangerous.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
While Dwarfs are generally not the most nimble inhabitants of the Old World, they can move surprisingly fast when not slowed by heavy armour.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Slayers seeks nothing more in life than an honorable and glorious death that shall expunge the shame that has pushed him upon this path, and to be remembered in the saga's of his people for all time.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
Dwarfs are not fast, yet they will soldier on, always moving despite any hazards encountered.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.
Those in the army can find succour or be replenished by the power of this champion.

effects.description: Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 3%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 6%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 9%

skillTree.localised_description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

effects.description: Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 1
Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 2
Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: It is not just the forces of Chaos that can despoil, break and ruin.

effects.description: Damage Building action: Additional 5% damage caused
Damage Building action: Additional 15% damage caused
Damage Building action: Additional 30% damage caused

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of a powerful figure extolling death and blasphemies can bring enemy ranks to their knees.

effects.description: Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -10%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -20%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -40%

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Whether by their sheer martial skills, toughness or determination, these Dwarfs, though unsuccesful in their quest, have inadvertently been molded into a magnificent warriors.

effects.description: Gains unique traits after defeating certain monsters
